pages.text: The Guano Golem (Robotogolem wanuensis) is related to the Snow Golem (Robotogolem nivalis) in the main Minecraft game. It is created in a similar way, leaves a trail of guano in its wake, and will pelt any hostile mobs around it with guano-balls.

pages.name: Guano Golem
pages.text: To create a Guano Golem, place a bat head on top of two blocks of guano
